drones.name: DreamEagle YS-20 Transport Drone
drones.desc: The Dreameagle YS-20 is a robust and versatile hexarotor drone designed to meet various transport needs with exceptional efficiency.

drones.name: EFT E610P 10L 6 Axis Agricultural Drone
drones.desc: The Kisan Agri Drone is engineered to elevate agricultural productivity through advanced technology and intelligent solutions.
